org.shared.net.nio

Class NioManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.net.nio.NioManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, ConnectionManager<NioConnection>, SocketManager<NioManager,NioConnection>

    public class NioManager
extends Object
implements SocketManager<NioManager,NioConnection>
    A transparent, asynchronous sockets layer for easy network programming that performs readiness selection on NioConnections via callbacks.

    • Nested Class Summary
